name: Forest Racer
description:
Tips & Instructions:

- Controls: WASD + Spacebar

- Camera doesn't turn with the car, but this benefits the game's obstacles with warnings to make the game a little more challenging

- Stay on the road! Exploring into the fields and mountains won't get you anywhere. Why? YOU'RE A CAR. If you ever fall off the road, you are able to jump back on it again.

- Highly recommended: Enter full-screen for better view.

- some obstacles need to be avoided and not crashed into.

- Pillars will send you flying to the air before you could escape it

GOAL:

- Get to the finish-line with at least 8 tokens

Extra Car Features:

- Dirt tires

- Dirt trail
